sense.name: someone who purchases goods or services
sense.examples: Remember that the customer is always right. Those customers have been waiting to be seated. Mary spotted a potential customer at the trade show and walked over to him. There are few customers for that type of high-end house kit.

sense.name: an individual with distinct traits, a character
sense.examples: There are some pretty tough-looking customers in this neighborhood. He looks fierce but he's an easy going customer when you get to know him.
